department: Departement of Public Work and Government Service (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on March 29, 2023 by 02:00PM EDT. All bids submitted after 02:00PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: The tender is for a contract with an expected contract start date of 2023-04-24 and an expected contract end date of 2023-04-24
